item.title: Data Cleaning and Exploration
item.description: On Tuesday, December 3rd at 6 pm, the wonderful Jaky Kueper will be enlightening us on how to go on a data adventure. Jaky has taken us through a cleaning and exploration workshop before, and she’s awesome! Come and join us to learn some common practices and procedures for data cleaning and exploration — how to get data into a ‘usable’ form and start looking at what they can tell you.
